name: Aged Compost (3 Gallons)
description:
This is what we feed to our worms. We like it because it is a consistent food source for the worms and provides a repeatable and reliable vermicompost "on the backside." 

The aged compost is made from organic refuse (grass clippings, leaves, tree limbs, etc.) that is chipper shreaded to a fine consistency. Over a 6-week period, it is allowed to compost (150°-160° F) and is turned once per week to insure a uniform product. This process assures you that there will be no fertilizer burn to your plants after applying the compost.

Please note: Shipping IS INCLUDED in the price.

INVENTORY: Approx. 500 Gallons

name: Midnight Madness Worm Castings (1 Gallon)
description:
Midnight Madness Worm Castings are triple screened to ensure consistency and the highest percentage of pure worm castings we can provide. These castings are nature's powerhouse when it comes to fertilizing your plants and amending your soil.

Midnight Madness is sold in 1 gallon bags (about 8 pounds) and shipped Priority Mail Flat Rate. For orders of more than 9 gallons, please contact for shipping.

Please note: Shipping IS INCLUDED in the price.

INVENTORY: 15 gallons

name: Monster Mash Potting Mix (3 Gallons)
description:
Monster Mash Potting Mix is a ready-to-use potting mix made from Midnight Madness Worm Castings. Light, airy, and remarkably nourishing, there is no finer seed starter. Monster Mash is ideal for container plants and raised bed gardens, as well.

Monster Mash is sold in 3 gallon bags (about 15 pounds) and shipped Priority Mail Flat Rate. For orders of more than 3 bags, please contact for shipping.

Please note: Shipping IS INCLUDED in the price.

INVENTORY: 15 bags
